Directions: In a large resealable bag, combine the lemon juice, butter, oil, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and garlic. Add shrimp; seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Broil shrimp 4 in. from the heat for 4 minutes or until pink.
Ingredients: 3/4 pound uncooked large shrimp, peeled and deveined
